option.isles-addons.custom-message.toolt: Enable/Disable the Custom Resource Drop message (shows XP)
option.isles-addons.rare-fishing-title.t: Enable/Disable the Rare Fishing Title on a rare resource drop
option.isles-addons.green-qte-notifier.t: Get notified in chat if there is a Green QTE nearby
Get notified in chat if there is a Purple QTE nearby
option.isles-addons.gold-qte-notifier.to: Get notified in chat if there is a Gold QTE nearby
option.isles-addons.stack-chat.tooltip: Enable/Disable message stacking in chat (duplicates will be stacked)
option.isles-addons.fishing-notifier.too: Enable/Disable the Fishing Notifier when you finish fishing
option.isles-addons.glowing-parkour-skul: Enable/Disable making the skulls in the Giant's Parkour glow
